price: Orada meleklerin Arş'ın etrafını kuşatarak, Rablerini hamd edip tesbih ederken görürsün. Aralarında hak ile hüküm verilmiş ve hamd, alemlerin Rabbi Allah’a mahsustur, denilmiştir.
arabic: وَتَرَى ٱلۡمَلَٰٓئِكَةَ حَآفِّينَ مِنۡ حَوۡلِ ٱلۡعَرۡشِ يُسَبِّحُونَ بِحَمۡدِ رَبِّهِمۡۚ وَقُضِيَ بَيۡنَهُم بِٱلۡحَقِّۚ وَقِيلَ ٱلۡحَمۡدُ لِلَّهِ رَبِّ ٱلۡعَٰلَمِينَ

version.title: Turkish translation - Shaaban Britsh
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Shaaban Britsh. Notice: Some referred translated verses corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: watarā al-malāikata ḥāffīna min ḥawli al-ʿarshi yusabbiḥūna biḥamdi rabbihim waquḍiya baynahum bil-ḥaqi waqīla al-ḥamdu lillahi rabbi al-ʿālamīna
